title: need someone  (。┰ω┰。)
body: (੭•̀ω•́)੭̸*✩⁺˚ looking for someone forgiving ( ु⚈᷁௰⚈᷁ ू) i main fill (∩❛ڡ❛∩) casual player, stuck in placements ෆ⃛(ٛ ˃ ु⍘⃘ ٛ˂) ु˓˓ٍ❀⃝ add me ԅ(≖‿≖ԅ)

replies.body:
if you continue to play games I'm sure you'll get through that tough placement stage. Just keep playing, most players find that after 10 games (win or lose) they will make it through and earn a placement in a rank!

GOOD LUCK!
I will play! Im on the grind for plat atm, (g2 70lp ish) add me ingame Katlife
How the fuck do you main "fill"?
another way to say i dont main any role? (´−｀) ﾝｰ
are you a hot grill gamer? ( ɵ̥̥ ˑ̫ ɵ̥̥) jk hi
